advancements.sculkevolution.pandoras_box: Unlock an Umbra Vault using a Warden Key, then face the consequences
advancements.sculkevolution.handheld_cat: Reach the maximum damage cap of the Sickle
Releases a sonic boom at the cost of all the sculk built up by the sickle.
enchantment.sculkevolution.soul_lunge.de: Uses a small portion of the sickle's built up sculk to dash forward.
enchantment.sculkevolution.hemostasis.de: Absorbs a small amount of the sickle's sculk to heal the user.
enchantment.sculkevolution.repulse.desc: Prevents the sickle from losing most of its sculk when hit, at the cost of a cooldown. Also reduces sculk loss from Echo Chamber.
